title: Bronze elo players looking to start a serious ranked team
body:
Are you tired of being picked on for being bronze? Do you want to start a name for yourself and prove to others that you can make it? Well hop on the same boat that I'm in. I am looking for any bronze elo players that are looking to start up a new ranked team with myself included, and climb up the ranks. I am on daily and prefer to play at night in NA (central time), but if you have a different playing time preference please let me know. I am open for any positions, i play all of them so I'm not picky. If you are seriously about starting up a team with me then please message me in game. My ign is ThundercatzTZ pm me if you want to join in.
Thank You for your time and have a wonderful rest of your days!!

replies.body: hey, im lvl 29 and  half, and yea, imma start bronze soon. (after a bit more games of course) so yea
Hey :). I'm a bronze player and I would really be interested in joining your team. PM me the details? My ign is JacqueRex09, by the way, and I main either support or adc.
oh and I am best mid lane
I am very much able to join I am silver l and right no I am I the makes of making a team so my in game name id PrinceofGmaes1 and  hope u and anyone else can join to strive to the top
Im silver 2 but i would totally be down to play with you guys. I main Jungle but i can play Top and Mid pretty well as well
I'm sorry that i'm responding back so late i'm adding both of you today and we can play some normal's first until we get 2 more people.
add me i wanna play top lane
I'm definitely interested. I'm bronze 3, but I play with friends that are gold and plat. I'm trying to start up a team too. Add me in game and we can start this team, I main jungle.
Bro it's just annoying just because your in a certain elo doesn't mean you belong there so that's all I'm saying.
Shit dude, I'm Plat and I'm tired of being picked on for being Plat. It's a cold harsh world out there buddy, the grass doesn't get any greener.
